body_html: Do you mean that you invoke the predict_scores() for multiple times? Yes, predict_scores always constructs graph every time. Hence, you can (1) collect all data and feed them all at once, or (2) use tf-serving.
body_text: Do you mean that you invoke the predict_scores() for multiple times? Yes, predict_scores always constructs graph every time. Hence, you can (1) collect all data and feed them all at once, or (2) use tf-serving.
body: Do you mean that you invoke the `predict_scores()` for multiple times? Yes, `predict_scores` always constructs graph every time. Hence, you can (1) collect all data and feed them all at once, or (2) use tf-serving.
